acknowledgments.quote: Our relationship with 1 2 3 Completed has proven itself for over 15 years now. We are happy to place any projects in their safe hands.
acknowledgments.ref: Noam Wekser, Oracle University Country Leader, Oracle

acknowledgments.quote: Thank you for the high quality delivery... You have met all our goals, and we will be happy to use your services in the future.
acknowledgments.ref: Oded Kedem, co-founder and chief technology officer, Zerto

acknowledgments.quote: Thank you for the training. Considering the limited time given  for this training it was an excellent overview and initial hands on experience.
acknowledgments.ref: Menahem Zeltzer, Tadiran Telecom

acknowledgments.quote: 123Completed consulting and training services help us win accounts and maintain existing customers to the highest customer satisfactory level.
acknowledgments.ref: Gershon Diner, VP Customer Services & Support, GigaSpaces

acknowledgments.quote: I wanted to thank you for the performance improvement... by a ratio of 20-50 times!
acknowledgments.ref: Gadi Inon, Director, Solutions Architect, Mobixell Networks

acknowledgments.quote: 1 2 3 Completed work is always extremely professional, and on time.
acknowledgments.ref: Nir Levion, General Manager, BluePhoenix KMS

acknowledgments.quote: Our experience with 1 2 3 Completed was nothing but sheer success.
acknowledgments.ref: Chen Burshan, VP Product Management ComAbility

acknowledgments.quote: Your contribution to our product development is very well noticed and your work force is demonstrating the highest professionalism.
acknowledgments.ref: Gershon Diner, VP Customer Services & Support, GigaSpaces

acknowledgments.quote: 1 2 3 Completed helped us provide a top of the line solution that is ready for extreme deployment environments.
acknowledgments.ref: Mia Urman, CEO, OraPlayer

acknowledgments.quote: 123Completed is a great Oracle Partner, assisting us in various domains and are always delivering excellent results.
acknowledgments.ref: Sary Zuck, Defence Sector Manager, Oracle

acknowledgments.quote: Thanks for delivering such a stable demo!
acknowledgments.ref: Guy Lubovitch, GigaSpaces

acknowledgments.quote: I recommend 1 2 3 Completed services to all my colleagues, the added value they bring is huge in many aspects and so is their business approach.
acknowledgments.ref: Nir Lavion, CEO, DSKnowledge

acknowledgments.quote: Thank you for the training... it was an excellent overview and initial hands on experience.
acknowledgments.ref: Menahem Zeltzer, Tadiran Telecom

acknowledgments.quote: We at Pontis are happy to be a 1 2 3 Completed reference and recommend 1 2 3 Completed services to all.
acknowledgments.ref: Shachar Segev, CTO, Pontis

acknowledgments.quote: We would like also to thank you for developing our new education courseware as well as delivering it worldwide with such great success.
acknowledgments.ref: Gershon Diner, VP Customer Services & Support, GigaSpaces

acknowledgments.quote: The 1 2 3 Completed company name says it all. These guys know how to deliver!
acknowledgments.ref: Lanir Shacham, CTO, Correlsense

acknowledgments.quote: All goals set by me in the beginning of this session were completely achieved and even beyond!
acknowledgments.ref: HP Software

acknowledgments.quote: Your knowledge and capabilities about databases is very significant and was crucial for the success of our project.
acknowledgments.ref: Ohad Maislish, R&D team leader, VMWare.

acknowledgments.quote: 123 Completed has provided Mobixell with a high quality project that meets all requirements... We at Mobixell recommend 123Completed services to all.
acknowledgments.ref: Oren Zucker, Infrastructure and Projects Group Manager, Mobixell

acknowledgments.quote: 1 2 3 Completed met every technical challenge in a creative, efficient, on time and on budget manner.
acknowledgments.ref: Avishai Shafir, VP Marketing & Pre-sale, BluePhoenix KMS

acknowledgments.quote: Thank you for providing us with such a great service and for being such a committed agile partner.
acknowledgments.ref: Gershon Diner, VP Customer Services & Support, GigaSpaces

acknowledgments.quote: I would like to thank you for your contribution to the significant performance improvement...
acknowledgments.ref: Miri Curiel, VP of R&D, Orca Interactive

acknowledgments.quote: Without your great help, I am sure the project we had would have never been finished on time
acknowledgments.ref: Ohad Maislish, R&D team leader, VMWare.

news.title: Gigaspaces Partnership
news.content: 123Completed, a leader in providing services to high-end software projects, has entered a partnership with GigaSpaces, a leading provider of application virtualization platforms and cloud...

news.title: Oracle Training
news.content: Oracle is proud to have 123Completed as a training and services provider. The relationship between Oracle and 123Completed experts has proven itself for over 15 years now...
